headline: Is Now the Right Moment for VICI Amid Its 14% Year-to-Date Rally?
summary: Thinking about adding VICI Properties to your portfolio or wondering if now is the time to take profits? You are not alone, and with good reason. For anyone watching the stock recently, the ride has been anything but dull, with the share price up 14.4% year-to-date and a remarkable 80.1% gain over the last five years. Even so, the past month has only seen a 2.0% move, and in the last week, shares dipped by 1.3% as broader market sentiment shifted. Many investors are parsing through a mix of...
